divs: sighting details hi. 7:40pm, we go outside as usual. the same bright light is there again different location different colors, but still to the west. it's hovering, and blinking. my boyfriend is speaking to the investigator, and doing so i'm looking to east out of no where 3-4 blinking lights appeared in the shape of a triangle. it was going toward object number one. as it nears that it jerks to the left towards the mountains. it descends into them. then~ something from the south, most likely a jet\plane goes directly to the location of object #2. that was the end of it. we go back out at 8:40ishpm. the first object is gone but we notice two jets coming from the east going above us to the mountains. after they're half way there theres a loud noise. almost canon like or "ba boom". we look back and 5 more jets are spread out coming from north and east. they all disappeared along with the first two behind the mountains.
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Kingman

This sighting has never been favorited.
